name: God's Framework
description:
Your "soul" has been captured by an uknown person who calls himself a self made god. He wants to make you a god too to create for his amusement.

Roam the proceduraly created land which you can change to what you desire, but also to what your master desires.

This game is just a practice land for me so don't expect anything super cool from this one, it has a small story tho.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Use the UI, shape the land.

H - God's handbook

ESC - Quit
